description: This file declares external API function prototypes for the Module Container component of a network service framework, including creation, removal, object enrollment, initialization, and sub-engagement/cancellation functions.

methods.name: AnscCreateModuleContainer
methods.description: Creates a new Module Container with specified context handles.

methods.name: AnscMcoCreate
methods.description: Creates a Module Container object with specified context handles.

methods.name: AnscMcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Module Container.

methods.name: AnscMcoSubEngage
methods.description: Engages the sub-components or services within the Module Container.

methods.name: AnscMcoSubCancel
methods.description: Cancels or disengages sub-components or services within the Module Container.
